Text.Page: A copper coin for your thoughts? Specifically, what are your thoughts on gathering?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Never turn down the opportunity."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

I knew you'd say that.

{@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} knows our current needs. She's my little gath-master. I just made that up.

"Gath-master?" You're kidding, right? That woman, I swear.

As usual, I need some pretty rare materials. I know you can handle it, .
Amazing! It must not have been easy to get this.
I know, luria fiber isn't easy to come by.
All right! Now I can take a break!
No gravehide, no compensation. Sorry to say, it's that simple. But you already knew that.

You know what? You need an awesome nickname, too. From now on, I shall call you the Great Doer! Like, do-er, you know? Someone who does stuff?

Oh man, that's just terrible, isn't it?
